info.title: Tofu-Maker API
info.description: RESTful Services to interact with Tofu-Maker runtime

tags.name: OpenTofuFromGitRepo
tags.description: APIs for running OpenTofu commands using OpenTofu scripts from a GIT Repo.

tags.name: Admin
tags.description: Admin services for managing the application.

tags.name: OpenTofuFromScripts
tags.description: APIs for running OpenTofu commands on the scripts sent via request body.

tags.name: OpenTofuFromDirectory
tags.description: APIs for running OpenTofu commands inside a provided directory.

post.description: Get OpenTofu Plan as JSON string from the list of script files provided
Get OpenTofu Plan as JSON string from the list of script files provided
Get OpenTofu Plan as JSON string from the given directory.

parameters.name: module_directory
parameters.description: directory name where the OpenTofu module files exist.

post.description: Deploy resources via OpenTofu from the given directory.

parameters.description: directory name where the OpenTofu module files exist.

parameters.description: directory name where the OpenTofu module files exist.

success.description: Describes if the request is successful

isPlanOnly.description: Flag to control if the deployment must only generate the OpenTofu or it must also apply the changes.

additionalProperties.description: Key-value pairs of variables that must be used to execute the OpenTofu request.

variables.description: Key-value pairs of variables that must be used to execute the OpenTofu request.

additionalProperties.description: Key-value pairs of variables that must be injected as environment variables to OpenTofu process.

envVariables.description: Key-value pairs of variables that must be injected as environment variables to OpenTofu process.

scripts.description: List of OpenTofu script files to be considered for deploying changes.

plan.description: OpenTofu plan as a JSON string

destroyScenario.description: The destroy scenario when the Xpanse client send the destroy request. Valid values: destroy,rollback,purge.

scripts.description: List of script files for destroy requests deployed via scripts

items.description: List of script files for destroy requests deployed via scripts

destroyScenario.description: This value is set only if the same is set in the request as well. This is useful only for the caller to differentiate what type of destroy it is. No difference in the way destroy will be executed.based on this flag. User may use this flag in case callback are used. So the calling application can know the result is for which specific destroy use case within the calling system.

commandStdOutput.description: stdout of the command returned as string.

commandStdError.description: stderr of the command returned as string.

additionalProperties.description: Data of all other files generated by the openTofu execution.The map key contains the file name and value is the file contents as string.

importantFileContentMap.description: Data of all other files generated by the openTofu execution.The map key contains the file name and value is the file contents as string.
